  • Method Details

    • EPSFactories

      com.here.platform.location.core.mapmatching.javadsl.EmissionProbabilityStrategiesMixin.EPSFactories$ EPSFactories()

    • usingDistanceWithGenericVertexType

      <O extends GeoCoordinateHolder, V> EmissionProbabilityStrategy<O,V> usingDistanceWithGenericVertexType()
      Creates an EmissionProbabilityStrategy based on the distance between the observation point and an OnRoad matched point.

      Use this overload of the method when the geographical coordinate type implements GeoCoordinateHolder.

    • usingDistanceWithGenericVertexType

      <O, V> EmissionProbabilityStrategy<O,V> usingDistanceWithGenericVertexType(GeoCoordinateAdapter<O> adapter)
      Creates an EmissionProbabilityStrategy based on the distance between the observation point and an OnRoad matched point.

      Parameters:
      adapter - GeoCoordinateAdapter to extract latitude and longitude for O

      Use this overload of the method when the geographical coordinate type does not implement GeoCoordinateHolder.

    • usingDistanceWithGenericVertexTypeImpl
